TopicTitle: The KSP 1.0 Grand Discussion Thread: Conquering Space Was Never This Easy!

> 
> Kasper why is the download so slowwwwww

Thousands of people downloading the game.
But but I was planning to sleep ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

They said that Engineers learned something that rhymes with "Schemlta-Vee"

So i was expecting Delta-V

But i found out that they learned how to make Mustard Tea.

> Hit F5...
> Edit: sweet website guys!

Have been multiple times
Wooo downloading!! New site looks funky!! nice one Squad!!

Just wanted to clarify this, as I've seen some people confused and was confused about it myself at first. KSP's site is currently not accessible at [https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/), and in order to download 1.0 you have to go to [https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/en/](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/en/).

:D1.0!!!!
Don't forget KSP is now also on [**GOG.com**](http://www.gog.com/game/kerbal_space_program) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Server migration, going to cadets better be working in 2hrs
